item.title: About Prateek
item.description: With over 20 years of experience in software engineering and management, I am a passionate and skilled leader who strives to deliver cutting-edge and user-centric solutions. My mission is to bridge the gap between technical and non-technical stakeholders, ensuring seamless communication and collaboration. My field of expertise is developing full stack software applications and managing end-to-end software development lifecycles, from concept to delivery. I currently work as a Software Development Manager at a leading Canadian tech company which is a global leader in IoT and connected transportation.

item.description: test Credits to creators for media used on this website: Theme: Mediumish jumbotron.jpg: Gros Morne by Flickr user Estefania Mera Hugo Docs: Getting Started Shortcodes: Built-in codes
